ResourceHeader.ResourceName: GEOS-2 Ultra Low Frequency Magnetic Field Components Level-1 (CDF)
ResourceHeader.Description:
This  dataset contains magnetic field components  from GEOS-2 S-300 wave experiment (search coil magnetometer) given in Instrument Spinning System in TM counts. Time resolution is 43 ms.

    Bx, By, Bz: Magnetic field
    Gx, Gy, Gz: adaptative gains that take values 5, 25 or 125
    Dx, Dy: despin signals corresponding To the continuous magnetic field rotation

The conversion to Volt units is given by:
Bx(V) = -(Bx*5.1/255.0 - 2.5)/Gx
Dx(V) = (Dx*5.1/255.0 -2.5)/10.0
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement:
Users of these data are encouraged to acknowledge ESA/ESTEC (European Space Agency / European Space Research and Technology Center), DSRI (Danish Space Research Institute), CNES (Centre National d'Etudes Spatiales) for their support to the SCM GEOS team, NASA/GSFC (National Aeronautics and Space Administration / Goddard Space Flight Center) and CNR (Consiglio Nazionale delle Ricerche) for their support to the MAG GEOS team, and the CDPP (Centre des Données de la Physique des Plasmas) for the distribution of the GEOS data, in all publications.

If PI/coI are not part of the publication list, then we suggest to add Specifically, we acknowledge Roger Gendrin and Patrick Robert for use of SCM data from the GEOS mission.

AccessURL.Name: REGARDS
AccessURL.Description: Access via CNES Data Archive for CDPP

Parameter.Name: Warning code
Parameter.Description: This  warning indicates if there is any problem on the data : 0 no problem, 1: the Quality of all or some of the frames in the format is suspect 2: the telemetry format is missing and dumny data has been substituted

Parameter.Name: Low speed format
Parameter.Description:
Low speed format 
Corresponding duration 1.37601 s

Parameter.Name: Euler Angles
Parameter.Description: Euler angles allow transition from rotating antennas frame into reference VDH frame. First component: precession, second: nutation, third: own rotation/gyration

Parameter.Name: Direction of Rotation
Parameter.Description:
Direction of Rotation of the probe.
e : electron, p : proton

Parameter.Name: Origin of the data
Parameter.Description: This parameter  indicates if the data are original or interpolated. 0 : interpolated, 1 : original

Parameter.Name: Spin Phase Angle
Parameter.Description: Spin Phase is given in the S/C system and S/C sens

Parameter.Name: Magnetic field components  in the instrument coordinate system
Parameter.Description:
Magnetic field components given in the instrument coordinate system 
Bx, By, Bz: Magnetic field
Gx, Gy, Gz: adaptative gains that take values 5, 25 or 125
Dx, Dy: despin signals corresponding to the continuous magnetic field rotation
Parameter.Caveats:
Note that Dx and Dy are truncated fromthe raw signal before numerisation. 
The conversion to Volt units is given by Bx(V) = -(Bx*5.1/255.0 - 2.5)/Gx and Dx(V) = (Dx*5.1/255.0 -2.5)/10.0
